page.title: 09Bad Egg : A Game
page.content: Not many people like this game because it is rough. The person on picks a subject like cars. The others choose a name of a car then all say the cars chosen. The person on throws a ball up and shouts a car name. Whoever chose that car runs for the ball and shouts "stop." All players stand still and the one with the ball takes 3 fairy steps, 3 strides, 3 jumps and 3 spits forward. He throws the ball at the nearest person. If the person is hit he gets a bad egg and he's on. If the ball misses the thrower is on again and gets a bad egg. This is repeated until someone has three bad eggs. The person who loses gets hit with a ball by each person playing.
